newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Nuplex announces 1 for 1 taxable issue.
newsitem.headline: Nuplex announces 1 for 1 taxable issue.

text.p: Auckland-based Nuplex Industries Ltd on Monday announced a taxable bonus issue of one ordinary share for every ordinary share on issue at November 15, 1996.
For tax purposes the bonus issue will be treated as a dividend in the hands of shareholders at a gross value of NZ$1.64 per share.
Imputation credits of $0.5412 will attach to each bonus share. The share register will be closed for entitlements on November 15, and the bonus shares will be allotted on November 22.
The company said the taxable bonus issue will distribute approximately $11.5 million from its imputation credit account.
